title: Sadie's Texas Cowboy Saviors
description: [Siren Menage Erotic Cowboy Menage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, bondage, sex toys] A traumatic experience causes twenty-five-year-old Sadie Myers to lose her memory. All that connects her to the past is an old photograph of herself standing outside a cattle ranch in Texas. Frightened and confused, but needing answers, she heads straight for the ranch. When cowboy brothers Matt and Joe Connors discover Sadie hiding in their barn, their first thought is to help and protect her. However, Sadie is a temptress. This beautiful woman bewitches and beguiles them, and they are unable to resist her feminine charms and latent sexuality. Sadie needs these two hunky cowboys like the air that she breathes. She feels sure they will protect her from the unknown threat that has caused her memory loss. Will Sadie be able to face her past when her memory returns? Or will her traumatic earlier life prove too powerful for her and her cowboy lovers to overcome? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Kayla  Knight
